st: Tanhai Mein Hum Teri Taakte Hain Raahein,
s:
Tanhai Mein Hum Teri Taakte Hain Raahein,
Tumhe Dekhne Ko Tarsati Hain Nigahein,

Bekhudi Ka Yeh Aalam Hai Kaisa,
Tumhe Yaad Karke Nikalti Hain Aahein…

st: Tere Hote Huye Bhi Tanhai Mili Hai,
s:
Tere Hote Huye Bhi Tanhai Mili Hai,
Wafa Karke Bhi Dekho Buraai Mili Hai,

Jitni Dua Ki Tumhe Pane Ki,
Us se Jayada Teri Judai Mili Hai…

st: Aankhein Roi Padhi Hani, Na Unka Paigam Aaya
s:
Aankhein Roi Padhi Hani, Na Unka Paigam Aaya
Chale Gaye Humein Akela Chodkar, Yeh Kaisa Mukaam Aaya

Meri Tanhai Mujhpar Hansi Yeh Keh Kar, Aur Boli
Bataa Aakhir Mera Siva Tere Kaun Kaam Aaya…

st: Sabhi Karte Hain Pyar Jeevan Mein,
s:
Sabhi Karte Hain Pyar Jeevan Mein,
Jo Humne Bhi Kiya Toh Kya Hua,

Sabhi Karte Hain Haasil Khusiyan Magar,
Jo Humne Gham Liya Toh Kya Hua….

st: Tanhai Se Dar Nahi Lagta Mujhe,
s:
Tanhai Se Dar Nahi Lagta Mujhe,
Mahfil Se Ghabra Jata Hun Main,

Koshish Karta Hun Yaadein Dafnane Ki,
Magar Tujhko Bhool Nahi Pata Hun Main…

st: Woh Khwabo Mein Aakar Rulate Hain,
s:
Woh Khwabo Mein Aakar Rulate Hain,
Hakikat Mein Na Aakar Tadpaate Hain,
Jinko Hum Samjhaya Karte The Kabhi,
Woh Log Aaj Humko Samjhate Hain…

st: Hamin Jaante Hain Ke Kaise Khuda Se,
s:
Hamin Jaante Hain Ke Kaise Khuda Se,
Tujhe Manga Hai Humne Eh Yaar Mere,
Teri Judai Ab Main Sahunga Nahi,
Sada Kareeb Rahna Dilbar Mere…

st: Na Dil Hota Na Lagate Yaaro,
s:
Na Dil Hota Na Lagate Yaaro,
Yeh Jeevan Hans Kar Bitate Yaaro,
Hansane Par Aa Jaate Hain Aansu,
Hamein Aise Toh Na Tadpaate Yaaro…

st: Raat Ki Tanhai Dasti Hai,
s:
Raat Ki Tanhai Dasti Hai,
Yaar Ki Bewafayi Hasti Hai,
Pyar Mein Mila Jo Tohfa Ise,
Sagar Ko Woh Ruswayi Dasti Hai….

st: Bhale Bhool Jana Aap Hamein,
s:
Bhale Bhool Jana Aap Hamein,
Hum Aapko Bhool Na Paayenge,
Aapka Hi Saath Mangenge Sada,
Hum Jab Bhi Jahan Mein Aayenge…

st: Insan Kahan Marta Hai Auron Ka Mara Hua,
s:
Insan Kahan Marta Hai Auron Ka Mara Hua,
Insan Ko Khud Uski Tanhai Maar Deti Hai,

Yun Toh Ji Bhi Sakta Hai Yeh Yaar Ki Judai Mein,
Magar Isko Toh Yahan Jag Hansayi Maar Deti Hai…

st: Chhod Do Tanhai Mein Mujhko Yaaro,
s:
Chhod Do Tanhai Mein Mujhko Yaaro,
Saath Mere Rahkar Kya Paaoge,

Agar Ho Gayi Aapko Bhi Mohabbat Kabhi,
Sagar Ki Tarah Tum Bhi Pachhtaoge…

st: Logon Ki Bheed Mein Toh Maalun Nahi Hota,
s:
Logon Ki Bheed Mein Toh Maalun Nahi Hota,
Magar Tanhai Mujhe Bahut Sata Jaati Hai,

Aap Toh Aate Nahi Ho Bulaane Par Bhi,
Aapki Yaad Na Jaane Kyu Chali Aati Hai…

st: Har Pal,
s:
Har Pal,
Mujhe Tumhari Yaad Aati Hai,

Baarish Ki Har Boond,
Tumhari Yaad Dilaati Hai,

Meri Parchayi Mein,
Tu Nazar Aati Hai,

Jab Bhi Dakhna Chahun Tumhe,
Tum Toh Nahi, Meri Tanhai Nazar Aati Hai….

st: Zindagi Intezaar Jaisi Hai,
s:
Zindagi Intezaar Jaisi Hai,
Door Tak Rahgujar Jaisi Hai,

Chand Bechehra Aahto Ke Siwa,
Saari Basti Majar Jaisi Hai,

Raaste Chal Rahe Hain Sadiyon Se,
Koi Manjil Dhool Jaisi Hai,

Koi Tanhai Abnahi Tanha,
Har Khamoshi Jaisi Hai,

Zindagi Roj Ka Hisab Kitab,
Kimati Shay Udhar Jaisi Hai…

st: Hole Hole Dil Ka Dard Badha Hai,
s:
Hole Hole Dil Ka Dard Badha Hai,
Tanhai Ka Dard Athah Chada Hai,

Ab Umeedo Ki Tassliya Chhodo,
Naya Paitra Fir Se Ek Ghada Hai,

Sarangi Tanhai Ki Mat Chhodo,
Abhi Abhi Fir Uska Patr Padha Hai,

Kis Se Karna Sikwe Aur Sikayat,
Aawara Dil Par Iljaam Madha Hai,

Sadiyon Ka Sannata Mann Mein Utra,
Bechare Dil Ne Kya Julm Lada Hai…

st: Koi Toh Batata Ki Kis Taraf Gaye Budhe,
s:
Koi Toh Batata Ki Kis Taraf Gaye Budhe,
Unka Pata Milega Toh Tumhe Bataunga,

Thak Toh Gaya Hu Abhi Hai Josho Junun Baaki,
Shuruat Kar Do Jamana Sar Pe Uthaunga,

Mahlon Ke Ird Gird Hain Kaanton Ki Jhadiyan,
Pathar Mein Phool Khoon E Jigar Se Khilaunga,

Baithoge Mere Sath Kabhi Chandani Mein Jab Tum,
Tanhaiyon Ki Dastan Tab Bataunga…

st: Tanhaiyan Khamoshiyan Gham Salonsal,
s:
Tanhaiyan Khamoshiyan Gham Salonsal,
Ab Nahin Uthta Hai Koi Bhi Khyal,

Dard Ko Ab Kuchh Dusra Naam De Do,
Khatm Hi Hota Nahin Iska Kamal,

Haay Bachpan Ki Kahani Narm Najuk,
Laplapata Zindagi Ka Har Sawal,

Nahi Lajjat Ab Tumahare Khwab Mein Bhi,
Sikayat Kaisi Bhala Kaisa Malal,

Door Tak Hai Apni Masti Ka Surur,
Jankar Bhi Kya Karoge Mere Haal…

st: Akele Baith Kya Sochte Ho,
s:
Akele Baith Kya Sochte Ho,
Ye Tanhai Hai Dakhil Bekasi Mein,

Tumhe Khul Jaayegi Dil Ki Tamanna,
Abhi Hai Band Khusbu Is Kali Mein,

Woh Lekar Kya Karen Ask Ke Dil,
Kisi Mein Daag Hai Kanta Kisi Mein,

Tumhe Kya Chhodkar Khush Ho Eh Daag,
Ki Tum Toh Roye Dete Ho Khusi Mein

st: Chhod Gaye Pardesh Mujhe,
s:
Chhod Gaye Pardesh Mujhe,
Kya Khat Likhna Bhi Bhool Gaye,

Main Aisi Abhagan Hu,
Mujhe Yaad Karna Bhi Bhool Gaye,

Khat Likhne Se Kya Fayda,
Jab Jawab Aap Dete Hi Nahin,

Tanhai Mein Rone Se Kya Fayda,
Jab Aap Pass Aate Nahin…

st: Aas Thi Jinse Hamein Khusi Ki Yaaro,
s:
Aas Thi Jinse Hamein Khusi Ki Yaaro,
Usne Hi Zindagi Mein Gham Milaye Meri,

Yakin Hai Humko Ek Din Tanhai Mein,
Kabhi Toh Yaad Karegi Woh Wafaye Meri,

Teri Yaadein Jab Satane Lage Mujhko,
Dil Halka Karne Ko Ro Leta Hu,

Kabhi Hoton Se Kabhi Aankho Se Lagakar,
Tera Rumal Asko Se Bhigo Leta Hu…

st: Chadti Jawani Mein Aaye Pardesh,
s:
Chadti Jawani Mein Aaye Pardesh,
Use Kamina Kahte Hain,

Chalti Ho Kamar Lachka Ke,
Yeh Dosh Hai Najar Ka,

Aaye Jo Mere Pass Toh Muh Fer Ke Baithe,
Yeh Aaj Naya Aapne Dastoor Nikala,

Hawa Ke Saath So So Kha Gaye Bal,
Najakat Dekhiye Unki Kamar ki…

st: Zindagi Ki Raaho Mein Har Kadam Par Tanhayi Hai,
s:
Zindagi Ki Raaho Mein Har Kadam Par Tanhayi Hai,
Koi Mere Saath Nahi Bas Teri Bewafayi Hai,

Mere Sahar Mein Yeh Dar Diwar Kis Ki Hai,
Yaha Meri Mohabbat Thi Aaj Majar Kis Ki Hai,

Mila Tha Jo Ek Sathi Woh Bhi Hum Se Chhutha Hai,
Bewafa Nahi Jab Woh Fir Kyu Hum Se Rutha Hai,

Is Tarah Se Mujhe Barbaad Kiya Hai Usne,
Ki Sham Kuchh Bhi Nahi Subah Kuchh Bhi Nahin…

st: Hum Phool Hain Gulab Sahi,
s:
Hum Phool Hain Gulab Sahi,
Daaman Kaanto Ne Thama Hai,

Apno Ne Hamein Thukraya Hai,
Haath Gairo Ne Thama Hai,

Roti Hai Aaj Hum Par Tanhai Humari,
Woh Bhi Na Paaye Shayad Parchhayi Humaari,

Tumhaari Dosti Ko Dekhkar Sabhi Rask Karta Hain,
Jo Bas Chalta To Duniya Chin Leti Zindagi Teri…

st: Yaad Karte Hain,
s:
Yaad Karte Hain,
Tumhe Tanhaayi Mein,

Dil Dooba Hai,
Ghamon Ki Gahrayi Mein,

Hamein Mat Dundhna,
Duniya Ki Bheed Mein,

Hum Milenge Tumko,
Tumhari Hi Parchhayi Mein…

st: Unki Adhik Sohbat Ne Hi,
s:
Unki Adhik Sohbat Ne Hi,
Unse Badi Mohabbat Karva Di,

Unki Adhik Mohabbat Ne Hi,
Unse Kadi Nafrat Karva Di,

Khasa Vakt Gujra Tha Tanhai Mein,
Bepanah Tadap Tadap Kar,

Unki Adhik Nafrat Ne Hi,
Unse Fir Mohabbat Karva Di…

st: Tere Shaher Se Bahut Door Chali Gayi Hu Main,
s:
Tere Shaher Se Bahut Door Chali Gayi Hu Main,
Fir Bhi Teri Tanhai Mein Teri Yaado Mein Aaungi Main,

Tu Bhul Gayi Hai Bhale Hi Voh Kasamein Saari,
Par Dosti Ki Har Kasam Nibhaya Karungi Main,

Tu Kabhi Pareshan Mat Hona Meri Dost,
Chaahe Kitna Bhi Main Ashq Bahaya Karu Teri Judai Mein,

Mera Pyar, Meri Dosti Tumhe Ek Din Khinch Layegi,
Tab Tak Yaado Se Hi Khud Ko Bahlaya Karungi Main,

Tum Kar Lena Saari Shikayatein Mujse,
Dekh Lena Eki Din Tumhe Gale Lagaungi Main…

st: Palko Pe Aansu Kyun,
s:
Palko Pe Aansu Kyun,
Tanhai Mein Hote Hain,

Dil Kyu Kisi Ki Yaad Mein,
Itna Rote Hain,

Yaad Jab Aati Hai Kisi Ki,
Toh Dil Ko Sukun Milta Hai,

Tute Dil Kahan Chain Ki,
Saans Sote Hain…

st: Jaane Taqdeer Mujhe Gher Kahan Layi Hai,
s:
Jaane Taqdeer Mujhe Gher Kahan Layi Hai,
Ab To Khud Se Bhi Ruswai Hi Ruswai Hai,
Koso’n Door Mujhse Meri Parchhai Hai,
Mere Saath Sirf Meri Tanhai Hai,
Na Jaane Mujhse Kya Khata Hui Sahil,
Meri Zindagi, Meri Hi Na Rhi Sahil…

st: Anjaan Shahar Ke Anjaan Raste,
s:
Anjaan Shahar Ke Anjaan Raste,
Meri Tanhaayi Par Muskarate Rahe,

Mein Bahut Der Tak Yunhi Chalti Rahi,
Tum Bahut Der Tak Yaad Aate Rahe….

st: Kisi Ko Isq Ki Achhayi  Ne Maar Dala,
s:
Kisi Ko Isq Ki Achhayi  Ne Maar Dala,
Kisi Ko Isq Ki Gahrai  Ne Maar Dala,

Karke Isq Koi Na Bacha,
Jo Bach Gaya Use Tanhayi  Ne Maar Dala…

st: Apno Ko Door Hote Dekha,
s:
Apno Ko Door Hote Dekha,

Sapno Ko Choor Hote Dekha,

Are Log Kahte Hain Ke Fool Kabhi Rote Nahin,

Hamne Foolon Ko Bhi Tanhaiyon Mein Rote Dekha…

st: Mere Baad Kidhar Jaayegi Tanhaai,
s:
Mere Baad Kidhar Jaayegi Tanhaai,
Main Jo Maraa To Mar Jaayegi Tanhai,

Main Jab Ro Ro Ke Dariya Ban Jaunga,
Us Din Paar Utar Jaayegi Tanhaai,

Tanhhai Ko Ghar Se Rukhsat Kar To Do,
Socho Kis Ke Ghar Jaayegi Tanhaai,

Veerana Hun Aabadi Se Aaya Hun,
Dekhegi Toh Dar Jayegi Tanhaai,

Yun Aao Ki Paon Ki Bhi Aawaj Na Ho,
Shor Huva Toh Mar Jaegi Tanhai…

st: Aansuon Ko Bahut Samjhaya,
s:
Aansuon Ko Bahut Samjhaya,
Ki Tanhai Mein Aaya Karo,
Is Tarah Mahfil Mein,
Hamara Majak Mat Udaya Karo,
Is Par Aansu Tadap Kar Kahte Hain,
Itne Logon Mein,
Aapko Tanha Paate Hain,
Isiliye Chale Aate Hain…

st: Akela Mehsoos Karo Jab Tanhai Mein
s:
Akela Mehsoos Karo Jab Tanhai Mein
Yaad Meri Aaye Jab Judai Mein
Main Tumhare Pass Hun Har Pal
Jab Chahe Dekh Lena Apni Parchhayi Mein…

st: Wo aksar tanha chhod jate hain
s:
Wo aksar tanha chhod jate hain
Bas mera dard mere sath rah jata hai
Main hanskar gale lag jata hu
Jab dard akela rah jata hai…

st: Tanha rehne ko majbur ho gaya hoon main,
s:
Tanha rehne ko majbur ho gaya hoon main,
Tujhe yaad karke zamaane Se kho gaya hoon main,
Yun na jgaa mujhe gehri neendon se zalim,
Odh ke kafan kabar mein so gaya hoon main…

st: Ek pal ehsas ban ke aate ho
s:
Ek pal ehsas ban ke aate ho
Or dusre pal khwab ban k udd jaate ho
Yeh maloom hai ki tanhai se dar lagta hai hamay
Phir bhi bar bar tanha chhor jaate ho…

st: Ashqon ke rang to mere aaj bhi feekey hain,
s:
Ashqon ke rang to mere aaj bhi feekey hain,
Tanhai mein bhi jiney key kuch tareekey hain,

Eik waqt aisa nahi hota ke bhool jaayen tujhe,
Bas muskaraney ke bahane maine bhi seekhey hain,

Hamney to andheron me jalney ki kasam khayi hai,
Aur harwaqt teri yaadon ke ujalon me bhi bheegey hain,

Ek tum hi to kahin nahi jaatey merey dil se nikal kar,
Pehle tum aatey ho dil mein, aur dhadkane peeche hain…

st: Usne Mujhe Apni Bewafai Ka Sabut De Diya,
s:
Usne Mujhe Apni Bewafai Ka Sabut De Diya,
Mujhe Meri Khushiyo Ki Judai Ka Sabut De Diya,
Usne Dikha Diya ’Kumar’ Ishq-E-Wafa Ka Anjaam Kya Hota Hai,
Mujhe Duniya Ki Bheed Me Meri Tanhai Ka Sabut De Diya…

st: Tum Kya Jaano Kya Hoti Hai Tanhai,
s:
Tum Kya Jaano Kya Hoti Hai Tanhai,
Tute Hue Patte Se Puchho Kya Hoti Hai Judai,
Yu Bewafai Ka Iljam Na Do Mere Dost,
Is Waqt Se Puchho Kab Yaad Teri, Mujhe Nahi Aai…

st: Phir Aaj Wahi Saam Hai Saath Mein Hai Meri Tanhai
s:
Phir Aaj Wahi Saam Hai Saath Mein Hai Meri Tanhai
Zindagi Kuch Thami Huyi Si Lagti Hai Kaisi Hai Yeh Khudaai
Koshish Karta Hun Kisi Tarah Byaan Kar Sakun Apne Jazbaton Ko
Sayad Isiliye Ban Jaati Hai Aksar Anjaane Mein Koi Rubai…

st: Tanhaiyan Kaisi Hoti Hain?
s:
Tanhaiyan Kaisi Hoti Hain?
Shayad Tumhare Jaisi Ya Mere Jaisi Hoti Hain
Duniya Ki Iss Bheed Mein Maine Tumhe Or Mujhe Akela Sa Paya Hai
Ek Pyari Si Muskaan Ke Peeche Udasi Ko Paya Hai
Baat Tumhari Ho Ya Meri Aajmane Wale Khuda Ne Khub Aajmaya Hai
Bas Dil Ke Kisi Kone Me Ek Takleef Mehsus Hoti Hai Ki
Aaj Tak Na Tumne Mujhe Samajh Paya Hai Na Maine Tumhe Samajh Paya Hai…

st: Waqt Guzrega Toh Hum Sambhal Jayenge
s:
Waqt Guzrega Toh Hum Sambhal Jayenge
Maut Se Pehla Samajh Jayenge
Ki Bewafai Unki Fitrat Hai, Na Ki Majburi
Tanhai Mein Hi Sahi, Hum Phir Se Bus Jayenge…

st: Zindgi Basar Nahi Karte Tanha
s:
Zindgi Basar Nahi Karte Tanha
Tanhai To Murdo Ka Naseeb Hota Hai
Woh Bewafa Hai To Bewafa Hi Sahi
Bewafa Bhi Dil Ke Kareeb Hota Hai…

st: Bahut Kuch Hai Dil Ki Gehrai Mein
s:
Bahut Kuch Hai Dil Ki Gehrai Mein
Tadaph Jata Hai Dil Raat Ki Tanhai Mein
Yun Ton Kehne Ko Dost Bahut Hain
Par Fark Hota Hai Saya Aur Parchhai Mein…

st: Tanhai Iss Tarah Barsi
s:
Tanhai Iss Tarah Barsi
Ke Gham-E-Ishq Mein Jam-E-Sharab Pee Gaya

Tere Intezar Mein Arsa-E-Hastee
Gard-E-Gham Taras Khaa Ke Pee Gayaa

Dil Kii Dharkan Mein Teri Yaadein Bikhar Gayee
Bujh Gai Roshni Meri Jab Terii Raan’aaii Chali Gayii

Dil Ki Bebsi Meri Koi Tawaazun Na Rahi
Bhool Gaya Sara Jamana ‘Sheikh’ Woh Mujko Chhod Gayii

st: Kisi Ne Hume Rulaya To Kya Bura Kiya
s:
Kisi Ne Hume Rulaya To Kya Bura Kiya
Dil Ko Dukhaya To Kya Bura Kiya
Hum To Pehle Se Hi Tanha The
Kisi Ne Ehsas Dilaya To Kya Bura Kiya?…

st: In Behte Hue Aansuon Se Aqidat Hai Mujhe Bhi
s:
In Behte Hue Aansuon Se Aqidat Hai Mujhe Bhi
Unki Tarha Hi Khud Se Shikayat Hai Mujhe Bhi
Wo Agar Nazuk Hain To Main Bhi Pathar Nahi
Tanhai Mein Rone Ki Aadat Hai Mujhe Bhi…

st: Hum Apni Hasti Mitakar Bhi Tanha Hain
s:
Hum Apni Hasti Mitakar Bhi Tanha Hain
Sab Kuch Luta Kar Bhi Tanha Hain
Log Door Tak Jate Hain Kisi Ke Liye
Aur Hum Uske Paas Rehkar Bhi Tanha Hain…

st: Zikr Unka Hi Aata Hai Fasane Mein
s:
Zikr Unka Hi Aata Hai Fasane Mein
Jinko Jaan Se Zyada Chaha Hai Zamane Mein
Tanhai Mein Unki Hi Yaado Ka Sahara Mila
NaKamyab Rahe Jinko Aqsar Bhulane Mein

st: Dur Tak Tanhai Bhara Safar Hai
s:
Dur Tak Tanhai Bhara Safar Hai
Na Koi Sathi Na Koi Humsafar Hai
Chale Jate Hain Dil Mein Ye Soch Kar Ki
Bas Agle Mod Par Khushiyon Ka Shaher Hai…

st: Pal Pal Tanhai Me Tadapta Raha
s:
Pal Pal Tanhai Me Tadapta Raha
Teri Yaadon Ke Tufano Se Ladta Raha
Koi Puchta To Kehta Theek Hu Main
Kaun Jaane Kaise Mar-Mar Kar Jeeta Raha Main…

st: Tufaan Me Bikhrate Chale Gaye
s:
Tufaan Me Bikhrate Chale Gaye
Tanhai Ki Gehrai Me Utarte Chale Gaye
Jannat Thi Har Subah Sham Jin Dosto Ke Sath
Ek-Ek Kar Ke Sab Bichhadte Chale Gaye…

st: Jo Na Hoti Mohabbat Ye Aansu Na Hote
s:
Jo Na Hoti Mohabbat Ye Aansu Na Hote
Dil Bhi Na Khota Aaj Tanha Na Hote
Deewano Si Apni Ye Haalat Na Hoti
Agar Jahan Mein Apna Koi Aur Bhi Hota…

st: Wohi Raat Ki Khamoshi Aur Tanhai
s:
Wohi Raat Ki Khamoshi Aur Tanhai
Yeh Hawa Kisi Ki Yaad Le Aayi
Hum To Baith Kar Uss Chand Ko Dekh Rahe The
Phir Na Jane Kyon Yeh Aankh Bhar Aayi…

st: Umar Bhar Tanhai Ka Hissa Rahe
s:
Umar Bhar Tanhai Ka Hissa Rahe
Ye Na Pooch Ke Hum Kaise Zinda Rahe
Us Se Keh Do Ki Ab Kisi Se Bhi Ja Kar Mile
Wo Humare Nahi, Hum Uske Na Rahe

st: Kaanton Si Chubhti Hai Tanhai
s:
Kaanton Si Chubhti Hai Tanhai
Angaron Si Sulagti Hai Tanhai
Koi Aa Kar Hum Dono Ko Hansa De
Main Rota Hoon Rone Lagti Hai Tanhai

st: Aye Khuda Humko Judai Na De
s:
Aye Khuda Humko Judai Na De
Hum Jee Lenge Tanha, Magar Unko Tanhai Na De
Humari Nigaho Mein Basi Hai Unki Surat
Unko Bhale Hi Hum Dikhai Na De

st: Voh Bhi Meri Tarah Hi Shaher Mein Tanha Hoga
s:
Voh Bhi Meri Tarah Hi Shaher Mein Tanha Hoga
Roshni Khatam Na Kar Aage Andhera Hoga

Pyaas Jis Nehr Se Takrayi Vo Banjar Nikli
Jisko Piche Kahi Chor Aaye Vo Dariya Hoga

Ek Mehfil Mein Kayi Mehfilein Hoti Hain Shareek
Jisko Bhi Pass Se Dekhoge Akela Hoga

Mere Baare Mein Koi Raay To Hogi Uski
Usne Mujhko Bhi Kabhi Tor Ke Dekha Hoga

st: Na Meri Koi Manzil Hai
s:
Na Meri Koi Manzil Hai
Na Koi Kinara
Tanhai Meri Mehfil Aur Yaadein Mera Sahara
Apno Se Bichad Ke Humne, Kuch Yu Waqt Gujara
Kabhi Zindagi Ko Tarshe, Kabhi Maut Ko Pukara
